messages.message: <!channel> PSA: CI builds will fail if you don’t leave your PR up for ~5 minutes before merging it. Merged PRs are closed therefore inaccessible to travis, and it fails while trying to clone it.
question about Travis, seems my trial has run out? I’m not sure how to get it configured such that it runs on our machines instead of mine
it also says that my machine key is not setup correctly
sent the error messages via email @Chetan

@dlluncor that’s a side effect of our “fork repo and work on that” workflow. the subscription only applies to PRs and branches for all repos on the instabase org, not on forked versions owned by us. you need to create a PR to see the CI results.

aah i misread:
(a) so you are looking at a CI run on your personal fork of instabase. you don’t seem to have hit the CI trial limit yet but you will (don’t integrate CI with your personal fork), as you need to be running and using travis with `instabase/instabase` to use the subscription
(b) there’s a key i set up with travis so `instabase/instabase` can access submodules. you haven’t set this up for your personal fork (and shouldn’t). create a PR, label it WIP and use that to monitor CI success

@dlluncor
Got it, good to know thanks!
